description: Troublemaker Trent Atkins (in a non-sexual role) lures bouncer Ken Houser into the bathroom with the promise of some oral service...before he makes good on his offer, muslcestud Filippo Romano and Daniel Montes burst in to teach Ken a lesson. Filippo and Daniel put Ken through all the paces...filling each end and making him submit to their greedy sexual desires. As Filippo and Daniel shower Ken with their loads, it's clear he won't be bullying Trent Atkins anymore!
title: Addiction, Part 2, Scene #03
